description.@en: Courtesans are particularly adept at capturing the attention of others, and all eyes turn towards them as they enter a room. You possess an unnaturally radiant countenance, as if you were painted by the finest of Maestros to be the very image of perfection.

effect.@en: By succeeding a Charm Test, a single person who can see you clearly is Captivated, and will come towards you. Should they enter a dangerous area to approach you, they can attempt a Resolve Test to Resist this effect. Once they are Engaged with you, the effects end. Captivation can only affect Humanoids and Mutants (including player Ancestries). Finally, the same person cannot be made subject to Captivation more than once in any 24 hour period.
